category.name: Substance Compliance IMDS Integration
category.category_description: Teamcenter Preferences for Substance Compliance International Material Data System (IMDS) Integration

preference.name: IMDS_Process_Chemical_Substance_Groups
preference.preference_description: Specifies the International Material Data System (IMDS) Substance Group Numbers for which user need to mention reason for usage. The default value is 15.
